measure.name: set_output_table_to_si_units_v_2
measure.display_name: Set Output Table To SI Units v2
measure.description: This measure keeps the output table in SI units and the sql file remains in SI units to allow generation of OpenStudio Results in SI units. Report is outputted in HTML and tab delimited. Includes output for Sizing period (ie. zone level reports). Only compatible with EnergyPlus versions after Feb 18, 2021
measure.modeler_description: This EnergyPlus measure keeps the the OutputControl:Table:Style in SI units and sets the solumn separator to TabAndHTML. Sets 'Unit Conversion for Tabular Data' in Output:SQLite to 'None'. Sets 'Report 1' to AllSummaryAndSizingPeriod.
